entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Glasgow
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
